actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1739 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 13. Record Vote Number: 195.

Amendment SA 1739 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S6085-6095; text: CR S6086) To redirect certain foreign assistance to the Government of Egypt as a result of the July 3, 2013, military coup d'etat.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1739 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 13. Record Vote Number: 195.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1739 proposed by Senator Paul.

purpose: To redirect certain foreign assistance to the Government of Egypt as a result of the July 3, 2013, military coup d'etat.
